input: Assertion (Q) : A Habeas Corpus writ petition dismissed by the Supreme Court can be admitted by the High Court under article 226 of the Constitution. Reason (R) : In exercising writ jurisdiction, the powers of the Supreme Court and High Court are concurrent.

options.A: Both Q and R are individually true and R is the correct explanation of Q
options.B: Both Q and R are individually true but R is not the correct explanation of Q
options.C: Q is true but R is false
options.D: Q is false but R is true
